name: Gun Farmer
description:
Farm up the best weapons to shoot in this farming shooter.

Monsters appear every night to try and harm you and your crops. They will drop seeds that you can use to farm bullets from.

Controls  
WASD, Arrow Keys, Left Joystick to Move  
E, N, Right Bumper to select next Weapon  
Q, Left Bumper to select previous Weapon  
F, M, Right DPAD to select next Tool  
R, Left DPAD to select next Tool  
SPACE, V, J, gamepad A, X to Attack with Weapon  
ENTER, C, K, gamepad B, Y to Use the selected Tool  
CTRL, Left Joystick Click to Crouch
